title: 60 Medieval Gold Portrait Icons 2D Male  Female Characters for Fantasy & Realism
description: This resource pack offers 60 high-quality 2D male and female character portrait icons in a stunning golden medieval style, perfect for fantasy and realistic games.
longDescription:
Overview

This resource pack offers 60 high-quality 2D male and female character portrait icons in a stunning golden medieval style, perfect for fantasy and realistic games. These portraits are perfect for use in role-playing games, strategy games, visual novels, or any project that requires beautifully crafted medieval character icons.


Key Features


60 unique male and female character icons in a medieval, golden style.

High Resolution: Each icon is 512x512 pixels, providing excellent clarity and detail.

Transparent Background: The icons come in PNG format with transparency, allowing them to be easily integrated into any user interface.

Fantasy and Realism Compatibility: These portraits are versatile and suitable for a wide range of game genres, including RPGs, fantasy, historical or realistic settings.

Versatile Use

Whether you’re creating a character select screen, a dialogue system or an inventory interface, these icons will help you bring your medieval characters to life. The rich golden tones provide a unique visual appeal, adding a touch of elegance to any project. They’re perfect for in-game NPC portraits, avatars or even loading screens.


Easy Integration

Designed with simplicity in mind, these icons are ready to be added to your project with minimal effort. The PNG format ensures compatibility with all major game engines. No need to worry about resizing or reformatting – just import the files and start using them.


Technical details


Resolution: 512x512 pixels

File format: PNG with transparent background

Number of icons: 60 (30 male, 30 female)

Support and updates

This is the first version of the resource. We are committed to providing ongoing support and updates to improve and expand the package. If you encounter any problems or have suggestions for future updates, do not hesitate to contact us. We value feedback and strive to make our resources as useful as possible for your projects.


We value your feedback!

If you enjoyed this resource and found it useful, please consider leaving a rating and review. Your feedback helps us improve and create better resources in the future.


For any questions or support, please contact us at: olgabutymova27@gmail.com.
